aboutMsg: A web developer from MNNIT Allahabad in the India. I love to create websites and always eager to learn new things.
achievements: Awarded Best Domain Name and got appreciated for minimalistic approach for project in Hack36 4.0 2021 (MNNIT Allahabad).
First Runner Up in Embedded System Design Event of Avishkar-2019 (MNNIT Allahabad).
Participated in the IARC challenge in Techkriti 2019 (IIT Kanpur).

projects.title: .CBS [ Code-Brigade Services ]
projects.description: A web-app to provide all services inside a restaurant with minimum contact i.e., using the user’s smartphone or tablet.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO WEBSITE
projects.description: A website to show all my skills and qualifications along with projects. Features: PWA, Responsive design, Preloading animationm, Smooth Scroll. ReactJS, Bootstrap, Firebase, React-Router-Dom.

projects.title: Identify the Dance Form
projects.description: A CNN model that identifies the dance form of the person in the image and classifies them into various categories of Indian classical Dance Forms

projects.title: Sentiment Analysis on Mother's Day Tweet
projects.description: A NLP classifier using SGD Classifier that analyses the sentiments of a tweet posted during Mother’s Day and classifies them into positive, negative and neutral.

projects.title: Emotion Detection of Tom & Jerry
projects.description: A model that detects emotion of the toons i.e. Tom & Jerry Cartoon video, priority is given to Tom, then Jerry, then any other character in the video frame.

projects.title: 16x16 LED Matrix
projects.description: A 16 x 16 (16 rows and 16 columns) LED Matrix controlled by Arduino UNO and 4x IC74hc595 shift registers, user can play games using the joystick mounted on the project board.
